category.name: Schedule Manager
category.category_description: Allows configuring of Schedule Manager functionality.

preference.name: ScheduleTaskAvailableAttributesWithRelations
preference.preference_description: Specifies the Schedule Task object attributes displayed in the Available Columns list in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application. Valid Values: ScheduleTask.object_desc - Displays Description in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application. ScheduleTask.start_date - Displays Start Date in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application. ScheduleTask.finish_date - Displays Finish Date in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application. ScheduleTask.duration - Displays Duration in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application. ScheduleTask.work_estimate - Displays Work Estimate in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application. ScheduleTask.priority - Displays Priority in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application. ScheduleTask.task_type - Displays Task Type in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application. ScheduleTask.constraint - Displays Constraint in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application. ScheduleTask.actual_start_date - Displays Actual Start Date in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application. ScheduleTask.actual_finish_date - Displays Actual Finish Date in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application. ScheduleTask.work_complete - Displays Work Complete in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application. ScheduleTask.complete_percent - Displays Work Complete Percent in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application. ScheduleTask.fnd0state - Displays State in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application. ScheduleTask.fnd0status - Displays Status in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application. ScheduleTask.SI - Displays Status Indicator in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application. ScheduleTask.object_name - Displays Name in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application. ScheduleTask.sch_task_deliverable_list - Displays Task Deliverables in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application. ScheduleTask.workflow_template - Displays Workflow Template in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application. ScheduleTask.worfklow_trigger_type - Displays Workflow Trigger in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application. ScheduleTask.ResourceAssignment - Displays ResourceAssignment in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application. predecessors - Displays Predecessors in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application. successors - Displays Successors in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application. baseline_start - Displays Baseline Start in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application. baseline_finish - Displays Baseline Finish in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application. baseline_duration - Displays Baseline Duration in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application. baseline_workestimate - Displays Baseline Work Estimate in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application. baseline_workcomplete - Displays Baseline Work Complete in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application. baseline_workcompletepercent - Displays Baseline Work Complete Percent in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application. ScheduleTask.owning_user - Displays Owner in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application. time_slack - Displays Time Slack in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application. ScheduleTask.wbs_code - Displays WBS Code in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application. ScheduleTask.fdp0AssociatedProcesses - Displays Associated Processes in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager applicat
